ch0054_00_kyo/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I have been waiting for you!
ch0054_00_kyo/0101_0701_02_10:
Fwahaha! Let us not waste a single day that
could be used to hone our skills!
ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_01_10:
I was originally a Gym Leader, and 
I made an invisible labyrinth in my Gym.
ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_02_10: Of course, it was to weed out weak Trainers!
ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_03_10:
But my daughter got lost in there once and
created quite a scene.
ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_04_10:
She has since grown to be my successor and a
fine ninja as well as a Gym Leader, but...
ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_05_10:
No matter how old she may become, she is still
my child. That story will always bring a smile
to my face.
ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0702_01_10:
My daughter looks up to me. Maybe it’s because
of this that she is showing very fast growth!
ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0702_02_10:
I must train twice as hard to make sure that I am
not overtaken by the girl.
ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0701_01_10:
We have a large park in Fuchsia City called the
Safari Zone.
ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0701_02_10:
It is a place where you can observe Pokémon
in their natural habitat.
ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0701_03_10:
If you ever go to the Kanto region, go see
for yourself! I am certain you’d discover
something new.
ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0702_01_10: I also patrol the Safari Zone myself.
ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0702_02_10:
Fwahaha! It is in order for all visiting guests
to enjoy the park safely!
ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0702_03_10:
The nature in Fuchsia City is our pride and joy!
Therefore, we must all cherish and protect
our environment!
ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0701_01_10:
Venomoth, a Pokémon that inhabits the Kanto
region, looks very beautiful.
ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0701_02_10:
However, behind that beauty, it hides a
deadly poison.
ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0701_03_10:
Beautiful things often hide their share of danger.
Remember that for the future.
ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0702_01_10:
Fwahaha! A long time ago, I was hit by
Venomoth’s poison.
ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0702_02_10:
But it was through that experience that I became
interested in Poison-type Pokémon. It was
through that I became the man in front of you!
ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0701_01_10: My Crobat hunts his prey swiftly and silently.
ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0701_02_10:
Would you not say that he is a ninja’s
perfect partner?
ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0701_03_10:
Of course, if I am not careful, he tries to
suck my blood!
ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0702_01_10:
Crobat and I are equals. Words do no justice to
what we share.
ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0702_02_10:
Perhaps trying to suck my blood is his way of
showing me affection.
ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0701_01_10:
If you’re going to be battling all sorts of pairs,
make sure you choose the type of moves
that your opponents are weak against.
ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0701_02_10:
Fwahaha! As long as you can find 
your opponent’s weakness, you’ll have
an edge in any Pokémon battle!
ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0701_03_10:
If you know not only what the opposing Pokémon
are weak to but also what yours are weak to...
ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0701_04_10:
you will be able to identify both opportunities
and crises!
ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0702_01_10:
Now that I’ve warned you to look out for
your opponent’s weaknesses, you understand
what that means, yes?
ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0702_02_10: It means that I challenge you!
ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0702_03_10:
I am intrigued to see how you will deal with my
Pokémon and my techniques!
ch0054_00_kyo/1701_0701_01_10:
I have a gift for you!
I’m sure you will find a good use for it!
ch0054_00_kyo/1701_0702_01_10:
Pokémon are both smart and strong.
You are the only one, however, that can
lead them to victory using items.
ch0054_00_kyo/1701_0702_02_10: Make sure to find the best use for it.
ch0054_00_kyo/2501_0701_01_10:
You have become much stronger than when we
first met!
ch0054_00_kyo/2501_0701_02_10:
Your desire to improve is splendid!
I truly want you as an apprentice!
ch0054_00_kyo/2501_0701_03_10: I enjoy watching your remarkable growth!
ch0054_00_kyo/2501_0702_01_10:
Even one that has lived on a single track as a
ninja and a Pokémon Trainer has something to
learn from your Pokémon handling.
ch0054_00_kyo/2501_0702_02_10:
I wonder, if I introduced you to my training and
teachings, would you become even stronger?
ch0054_00_kyo/2501_0702_03_10:
Fwahaha! No, I will not force you. But if you are
ever interested, come talk to me!
ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0701_01_10:
It is sobering to see how quickly young Trainers
become stronger.
ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0701_02_10: Whether through my daughter, Janine, or you...
ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0701_03_10:
it is very possible I’ll have the privilege to see
one of my students grow to new heights and
leave splendid results!
ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0701_04_10:
I would like you to be my daughter’s rival.
The two of you would be perfect for honing
each other’s skills!
ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0702_01_10:
Janine claims that her skill in both Pokémon
battles and ninja arts are not adequate.
ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0702_02_10:
If she had somebody to bounce off, I’m sure
she would be able to grow, too.
ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0702_03_10:
Not to mention, I am certain that you could learn
something from her as well.
ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0702_04_10:
I look forward to the growth the two of you
will display!
ch0054_00_kyo/3001_0701_01_10:
If you find yourself struggling to wake up
in the morning, I suggest splashing your
face with cold water.
ch0054_00_kyo/3002_0701_01_10:
It has become my routine to rise
with the sun in the morning.
ch0054_00_kyo/3003_0701_01_10:
Fwahaha! Time to apply my ninja techniques
to the lunch my lovely daughter made me.
ch0054_00_kyo/3004_0701_01_10:
Rigorous daily training is the key
to securing glorious victory.
ch0054_00_kyo/3005_0701_01_10:
True ninjas adapt to the darkness and make it
their home by becoming one with the night.
ch0054_00_kyo/3006_0701_01_10:
You still seem full of energy.
That is excellent! Continue your training!
